templates.title: Simple n8n With Postgres
templates.description: complete template for getting up and running with a basic n8n template
templates.note: This template requires external secrets to be created before deployment: n8n_db_password, n8n_smtp_password, n8n_encryption_key, n8n_user_management_jwt_secret. Also requires 'proxy' external network for Traefik integration.

env.name: N8N_DOMAIN
env.label: N8N Domain
env.description: The domain where n8n will be accessible (required for Traefik routing)

env.name: ROUTE_NAME
env.label: Traefik Route Name
env.description: Unique route name for Traefik (e.g., n8n-prod)

templates.title: Simple Nginx Test
templates.description: Simple nginx test to verify template loading
